Behavior, interference simplex and periodicity duplex

```{r echo=FALSE}
HARMONIC_DYADS <- EXPERIMENTS$`Harmonic dyads (3 dB roll-off)`
harmonic.behaviour = HARMONIC_DYADS$behaviour
harmonic.interference.simplex = HARMONIC_DYADS$models$`Hutchinson & Knopoff (1978)`
harmonic.periodicity.duplex = HARMONIC_DYADS$models$`mami.codi.m.1.t.1.h.2.l.-1.r.73.5759`
#periodicity.simplex.harmonic = HARMONIC_DYADS$models$`mami.codi.m.1.t.1.h.0.l.0.r.73.5759`

plot.interval.consonance(harmonic.behaviour$summary$interval,
                         harmonic.behaviour$summary$rating,
                         harmonic.behaviour$full$data$interval,
                         harmonic.behaviour$full$data$rating)
plot.interval.consonance(harmonic.interference.simplex$full$profile$interval,
                         harmonic.interference.simplex$full$profile$output,
                         harmonic.interference.simplex$full$raw_profile$interval,
                         harmonic.interference.simplex$full$raw_profile$output)
plot.interval.consonance(harmonic.periodicity.duplex$full$profile$interval,
                         harmonic.periodicity.duplex$full$profile$output,
                         harmonic.periodicity.duplex$full$raw_profile$interval,
                         harmonic.periodicity.duplex$full$raw_profile$output)
```
